steps.instruction_text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet, holding the ends with your hands.

steps.instruction_text_vi: Siết your traps by shrugging your shoulders upward, lifting the band as high as possible.

steps.instruction_text: Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Giữ co cơ trong chốc lát, then Từ từ hạ xuống your shoulders back down về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

steps.instruction_text: Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.

steps.instruction_text: Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.

steps.instruction_text: As you push back up, lift one leg off the ground and kick it out to the side, keeping it straight.

steps.instruction_text: With a controlled motion, bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.

steps.instruction_text: Continue the motion until your arms are parallel to the ground.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

steps.instruction_text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand with an overhand grip.

steps.instruction_text: In one fluid motion, explosively extend your hips and knees while shrugging your shoulders.

steps.instruction_text: Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

steps.instruction_text: Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.

steps.instruction_text: Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight. Perform with reverse intensity.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Kéo yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight. Perform with reverse intensity.

steps.instruction_text: Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Once your cằm vượt qua thanh, lower yourself back down về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại theo số lần mong muốn.

steps.instruction_text: Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Bắt đầu ở tư thế plank cao with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.

steps.instruction_text: Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Siết cơ trung tâm (core) and Hạ người xuống towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.

steps.instruction_text: Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position. Maintain macro form throughout.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Đẩy qua lòng bàn tay to extend your arms and Trở về vị trí ban đầu. Maintain macro form throughout.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại theo số lần mong muốn.

steps.instruction_text: Start by lying face down on a stability ball with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes touching the ground.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Start by lying face down on a stability ball with your feet rộng bằng vai and your toes touching the ground.

steps.instruction_text: Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Đặt your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.

steps.instruction_text: Engage your core muscles and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, keeping your back straight.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Siết cơ trung tâm (core) muscles and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, keeping your back straight.

steps.instruction_text: Rotate your torso to one side, bringing your shoulder towards your hip. Keep your hips and legs stable throughout the movement.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Xoay thân mình to one side, bringing your shoulder towards your hip. Giữ your hips and legs stable throughout the movement.

steps.instruction_text: Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tạm dừng 1 nhịp, then Trở về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: (gentle variation) Repeat the rotation to the other side.
steps.instruction_text_vi: (gentle variation) Lặp lại the rotation to the other side.

steps.instruction_text: Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tiếp tục luân phiên sides for số lần lặp mong muốn.

steps.instruction_text: Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the incline bench to a comfortable angle.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the incline bench to a comfortable angle.

steps.instruction_text: Stand facing away from the pulley with your feet shoulder-width apart.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Đứng facing away from the pulley with your feet rộng bằng vai.

steps.instruction_text: Grasp the rope with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight overhead.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Nắm dây thừng with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight overhead.

steps.instruction_text: (reverse variation) Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
steps.instruction_text_vi: (reverse variation) Giữ your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.

steps.instruction_text: Lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows until your forearms touch your biceps.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Hạ the rope behind your head by bending your elbows until your forearms touch your biceps.

steps.instruction_text: Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tạm dừng 1 nhịp, then extend your arms back về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại theo số lần mong muốn.

steps.instruction_text: Attach a rope to a cable machine at waist height.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Gắn dây thừng vào máy cáp at waist height.

steps.instruction_text: Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Đứng facing the cable machine with your feet rộng bằng vai.

steps.instruction_text: (heavy variation) Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
steps.instruction_text_vi: (heavy variation) Gập đầu gối and Hạ người xuống into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.

steps.instruction_text: Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder-width apart.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Nắm dây thừng with an overhand grip, with your hands rộng bằng vai.

steps.instruction_text: Engage your core and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Siết cơ trung tâm (core) and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

steps.instruction_text: Keep your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Giữ your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.

steps.instruction_text: Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tạm dừng 1 nhịp at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại theo số lần mong muốn.

steps.instruction_text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Đứng hai chân rộng bằng vai and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.

steps.instruction_text: Hold the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Cầm (tạ/thiết bị) with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.

steps.instruction_text: Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.

steps.instruction_text: Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Duỗi your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.

steps.instruction_text: Engage your core and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Siết cơ trung tâm (core) and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.

steps.instruction_text: Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Giữ tư thế trong 15–30 giây, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with seated intensity.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại theo số lần mong muốn, then switch sides. Perform with seated intensity.

steps.instruction_text: Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Ngồi trên ghế tập with your feet flat on the ground and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, Lòng bàn tay hướng down.

steps.instruction_text: Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.

steps.instruction_text: Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your body. Emphasize prone control.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Từ từ curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your body. Emphasize prone control.

steps.instruction_text: Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tạm dừng 1 nhịp at the top, then slowly Hạ barbell trở lại xuống về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại theo số lần mong muốn.

steps.instruction_text: Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.

steps.instruction_text: Engage your core and lift your knees towards your chest, twisting your torso to the side as you do so.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Siết cơ trung tâm (core) and lift your knees towards your chest, twisting your torso to the side as you do so.

steps.instruction_text: Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tạm dừng 1 nhịp at the top, then Từ từ hạ xuống your legs back down về vị trí ban đầu.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat on the other side, twisting your torso in the opposite direction.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại on the other side, twisting your torso in the opposite direction.

steps.instruction_text: Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize firm control.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tiếp tục luân phiên sides for số lần lặp mong muốn. Emphasize firm control.

steps.instruction_text: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Đứng hai chân rộng bằng vai, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your Lòng bàn tay hướng forward.

steps.instruction_text: (horizontal variation) Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
steps.instruction_text_vi: (horizontal variation) Đẩy one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.

steps.instruction_text: Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Hạ the dumbbell back to shoulder level.

steps.instruction_text: Repeat with the other arm.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Lặp lại with the other arm.

steps.instruction_text: Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.
steps.instruction_text_vi: Tiếp tục luân phiên arms for số lần lặp mong muốn.
